unnormalised: Organic farming is the way to go, no doubt! My Nana used to do it near his village, Baramati, since forever. Less chemicals, healthier food for everyone. Heard IIT Kanpur is doing some amazing research on it now. It is truly the future. Imagine all our farms following it by 2030! Jai Kisan! I remember he used to start at 05:00 hrs sharp! On 26/01, he would have a special harvest festival. Even made extra Rs. 5000 a year selling organic jaggery. I visited on 12/03/2024!
